org.framed.orm.ui.editPart.shape

Class ORMSegmentEditPart

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractGraphicalEditPart
      • org.framed.orm.ui.editPart.shape.ORMSegmentEditPart

extends AbstractGraphicalEditPart
    This EditPart is for Segments.
    Author:
    Kay Bierzynski

    • Constructor Detail

      • ORMSegmentEditPart

        public ORMSegmentEditPart()
        Constructor of this class. In which the class is initialized through calling the constructor of it's parent, initializing it's Adapter and initializing the global variables collectNamedElement and collectionEle.

    • Method Detail

      • createFigure

        protected org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure createFigure()
        A Segment has as a figure a PartFigure.

      • addChildVisual

        protected void addChildVisual(EditPart childEditPart,
                  int index)
        In case of this EditPart that would be the figure of NamedElement s. When more than 3 named elements are added to this Segment, than the label collectNamedElement( it has as a text ...) are added and the names of the named elements with index >2 are collected and shown in the tooltip(collectionEle) of the label collectNamedElement.

      • removeChildVisual

        protected void removeChildVisual(EditPart childEditPart)
        In case of this EditPart that would be the figures of NamedElements. Depending on the index of the named element it is removed from the contentPane or the collectionEle. When after the removing the contentPane has less than four children and has a collectNamedElement, which has at least one children, than a children is taken from collectionNamedElement and added before the collectEle. At end this method tests if the collectionNamedElement contains at least one children when not than the the collectEle is removed from the conetntPane.
